data: Ripped by an asteroid stray, the space-ship drifted helplessly... until suddenly, across the shuddering deeps, a strange voice called to her.
Ripped by an asteroid stray, the space-ship drifted helplessly ... until suddenly, across the shuddering deeps, a strange voice called to her.
